TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceContainer implements class System.IServiceProvider

span.span: Provides a container for services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据定义，服务容器是服务提供商。A service container is, by definition, a service provider. 除了提供服务外，它还提供了用于添加和删除服务的机制。In addition to providing services, it also provides a mechanism for adding and removing services. 服务是 .NET Framework 设计时体系结构的基础。Services are a foundation of the .NET Framework design-time architecture. 服务提供对提供服务或服务的服务对象所实现的特定功能和方法的设计时对象。Services provide design-time objects access to specific features and methods implemented by a service object that provides a service or services. 若要在设计时获取服务，请调用 设计模式下的组件的方法。To obtain a service at design time, call the method of a component sited in design mode. 设计器和其他对象可以在设计时通过界面添加或删除服务 。Designers and other objects can add or remove services at design time through the interface. 服务容器可由其他服务容器包含，形成服务容器的树。Service containers can be contained by other service containers, forming a tree of service containers. 默认情况下， 接口会将服务添加到最近的服务容器。By default, the interface adds services to the closest service container. 添加服务后，可以使用说明来添加服务。When a service is added, it can be added with instructions to promote it. 升级服务时，会将其添加到任何父服务容器中，直到达到服务容器树的顶部。When a service is promoted, it is added to any parent service container, on up until the top of the service container tree is reached. 这使设计器能够提供进程中的其他对象可以使用的全局服务。This allows a designer to provide a global service that other objects in the process can use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含的代码 ，该代码配置为演示链接服务容器的网络的行为。The following code example contains the code for a that is configured to demonstrate the behavior of a network of linked service containers. [!code-cpp[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/CPP/serviceform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/CS/serviceform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IServiceContainerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IServiceContainerExample/VB/serviceform.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的服务添加到服务容器中。

span.span: Adds the specified service to the service container.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddService(class System.Type serviceType, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback callback) cil managed
Public Sub AddService (serviceType As Type, callback As ServiceCreatorCallback)
public: void AddService(Type ^ serviceType, System::ComponentModel::Design::ServiceCreatorCallback ^ callback);
abstract member AddService : Type * System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback -> unit

span.span: The type of service to add.

param.name: callback
param.span: 用于创建服务的回调对象。

span.span: A callback object that is used to create the service.

param.span: 这可以将服务声明为可用，但在请求服务之前延迟创建对象。

span.span: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.
